'''Wisdom Orb''' is an event gadget from the event [[Fabulous Fungus Frenzy]] that is used to capture, accommodate, and command [[Fungi]]. It is obtained from the Event Quest ''[[The Most Fantastic Tournament You've Never Heard Of?]]''.
